attributes.title: Opencare Data
attributes.description:
Get primary and secondary data from the opencare project.

  • Primary data refer to the online conversation (posts and comments).
  • Secondary data refer to the ethnographic work done on the primary data (annotations and codes, or tags).

You can also access these data through APIs. Learn more on data in opencare and get full APIs documentation: https://github.com/opencarecc/opencare-data-documentation.

The project is ongoing. A second, more up-to-date version of this dataset will be uploaded onto Zenodo in late 2017.
